comments:
When i open up the new Externalize Strings dialog in the intergration build of 
200405060200 i can't rename the key value anymore, if i close the dialog it 
comes with a nullpointer and then the old key (0 or 1 the default ones) are 
still there.

Another thing: I can't change the key's anymore directly in the table, i have 
to popup the edit dialog, this is a bit annoying, it is much faster to use 
directly the editor in the table.
